title: League of legends processes closing
body: Hello so last night after I got out of a game, my client said that I had disconnected and that I had to re-log in. So I hit the exit button and as soon as I did, everything started freezing up and lagging out on my PC and I had to manually shut down my laptop. The problem now is that I am unable to start up League. I've tried reinstalling and system restoring but as soon as it pops up and tries to run/the logo is trying to load; the processes automatically close. I'm trying to hurry up and fix this for a tournament coming up in 4 hours and would appreciate any help I can get.

replies.body:
An OS or some antivirus update may be the cause here.  The launcher failing to load is normally caused by a security setting preventing it from launching.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help.

You could also have corrupt files, especially after a restore.  Just in case, you might also need to download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a clean reinstall.

I hope that helps!
Update : the client will not start up
